body: RNS in Honduras Culture and Politics writes: "Community radio serves to broaden public access to the airwaves. [...] Now the Comisi贸n Nacional de Telecomunicaciones (CONATEL) wants to issue a rule suspending the issuance of licenses and frequencies for low power FM community radio stations."

title: Honduras: Community Radio in Danger

sentence: RNS in Honduras Culture and Politics writes: "Community radio serves to broaden public access to the airwaves.
[...] Now the Comisi贸n Nacional de Telecomunicaciones (CONATEL) wants to issue a rule suspending the issuance of licenses and frequencies for low power FM community radio stations."
